The injury has been confirmed to be a fracture in one bone and a chip in another, so I have to wear a cast for 2-4 weeks. I can use the mouse with my good hand, but its kinda impossible to type well (this post has taken like 4 mins already), so I think I'm out till I get the cast off. Hopefully the bones will heal soon.
